E.M.M.A Rest6 CFS

The E.M.M.A Rest6 CFS is a simple and light implementation for writing, deleting and updating data in the EEPROM memory. More...

Detailed Description

The E.M.M.A Rest6 CFS is a simple and light implementation for writing, deleting and updating data in the EEPROM memory.

Energy Monitoring & Management Agent for IPV6 RestFull HTTP Copyright (C) 2010 DUHART Clément <duhart.clement@gmail.com>

This program is free software: you can redistribute it and/or modify it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by the Free Software Foundation, either version 3 of the License, or (at your option) any later version.

This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the GNU General Public License for more details. You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public License along with this program. If not, see <http://www.gnu.org/licenses/>.

All rights reserved.

Documentation : http://www.ece.fr/~duhart//emma/doc/html/

E.M.M.A Rest6 CFS allows to define several light API for persistent data saving like log or report. The object to save must implement LOGGABLE() structure like Report or Ressource. The child API can be make by using simple define (LogAPI, ReportAPI, ...).

Energy Monitoring & Management Agent for IPV6 RestFull HTTP Copyright (C) 2010 DUHART Clément <duhart.clement@gmail.com>

This program is free software: you can redistribute it and/or modify it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by the Free Software Foundation, either version 3 of the License, or (at your option) any later version.

This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the GNU General Public License for more details. You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public License along with this program. If not, see <http://www.gnu.org/licenses/>.

All rights reserved.

Documentation : http://www.ece.fr/~duhart//emma/doc/html/

Definition at line 65 of file Emma-CFS-API.h.

#define LOG_DELETE ( buf,
buff2,
cfs,
id   )     file_delete (buf,buff2, cfs, id,sizeof(struct Ressource), CFS_LOG_OFFSET, CFS_LOG_OFFSET_END)

Delete a specific log.

Parameters:
buf Buffer with minimal size of : sizeof(struct Loggable)
buff2 Buffer with minimal size of : sizeof(struct Loggable)
cfs File pointer for offset among log slot.
id The id of the log to remove.
Return values:
0 Success in deleting the specific log slot.
-1 Unable to find the specific log slot.

buf Buffer with minimal size of : sizeof(struct Loggable)

cfs File pointer for offset among log slot.
Return values:

-1 Unable to format the log slot.

Definition at line 195 of file Emma-CFS-API.h.

#define LOG_NEW ( data,
buf,
cfs   )     file_new (data,buf, cfs, sizeof(struct Ressource), CFS_LOG_OFFSET, CFS_LOG_OFFSET_END)

Save a new log in the first empty slot in EEPROM memory found since cfs.

Parameters:
data Pointer on a Ressource object to save.
buf An empty buffer with a minimal size of : sizeof(struct Loggable )
cfs File pointer for offset among log slot.
Return values:
0 Success in saving the new log
-1 All the log slot are used.

Read a specific log in the EEPROM memory.

Parameters:
out Pointer on the Ressource object to output.
id Id of the log to read.
cfs File pointer for offset among log slot.
Return values:
0 Success in reading the next log
-1 Unable to find the log in EEPROM memory.

cfs   )     file_read (out, type, cfs, sizeof(struct Ressource), -1, CFS_LOG_OFFSET, CFS_LOG_OFFSET_END)

Parameters:
out Pointer on the Ressource object to output.

cfs File pointer for offset among log slot.
Return values:

-1 Unable to read the next log in EEPROM memory.

Function Documentation

char file_delete ( void *  buf,
char *  Buff,
struct File *  root,
int  id,
int  size,
int  cfs_offset,
int  cfs_offset_end 
)

Driver function for deleting in EEPROM memory.

Parameters:
buf Buffer with minimal size of sizeof(struct Loggable)
root File pointer on the EEPROM memory.
size Size of the dataStructure to store the result.
id Id of the loggable data to delete, must be equal to -1 to format all slot.
cfs_offset Address memory of the first slot
cfs_offset_end Address memory of the last slot
Return values:
0 Success in deleting.
1 Fail in deleting.

Definition at line 185 of file Emma-Rest6Engine_cfs.c.

char file_new ( void *  data,
char *  Buff,
struct File *  root,
int  size,
int  cfs_offset,
int  cfs_offset_end 
)

Driver function for saving a new data slot in EEPROM memory.

Parameters:
data DataStructure to save.
Buff Buffer with minimal size of sizeof(struct Loggable)
root File pointer on the EEPROM memory.
size Size of the dataStructure to save.
cfs_offset Address memory of the first slot
cfs_offset_end Address memory of the last slot
Return values:
0 Success in saving.
1 Fail in saving.

Definition at line 133 of file Emma-Rest6Engine_cfs.c.

char file_read ( void *  data,
char  type,
struct File *  root,
int  size,
int  id,
int  cfs_offset,
int  cfs_offset_end 
)

Driver function for reading in EEPROM memory.

Parameters:
data DataStructure to store the result.
type Type of reading : CFS_BEGIN, CFS_NEXT, CFS_FIRST_EMPTY
root File pointer on the EEPROM memory.
size Size of the dataStructure to store the result.
id Id of the loggable data to read, must be equal to -1 to read the next slot.
cfs_offset Address memory of the first slot
cfs_offset_end Address memory of the last slot
Return values:
0 Success in reading.
1 Fail in reading.

size Size of the dataStructure to update.
